name: cumin
description: This is a simple code editor that allows you to write and run js code. It uses the Monaco editor for syntax highlighting and code completion, and it supports running code in JavaScript. The editor is built using React and Next.js. It is designed to be simple and easy to use, with a clean and modern interface. The editor supports syntax highlighting, code completion, and error checking. It also has a built-in console for running code and displaying output. The editor is responsive and works well on both desktop and mobile devices.
author: Cumin
